newsitem.title: BURMA: Burma sends condolence message on late Deng.
newsitem.headline: Burma sends condolence message on late Deng.

text.p: Burmese Prime Minister General Than Shwe sent a condolence message to the Chinese government saying that Burma had lost a truly great friend with the passing of paramount leader Deng Xiaoping.

"The greatness of man does not lie only in the accomplishment during his lifetime, but also in the spirit with which he had guided the future generation," said the message sent on Thursday and received by Reuters on Friday.
"The continued progress and development of China in line with the vision of the late great statesman will be further consolidated in the years ahead," it said.
